# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_grpc_cpp_bin
  TOOL_grpc_cpp_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/grpc_cpp
  grpc_cpp
)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

add_library(client-yc_private-oauth)


set_property(TARGET client-yc_private-oauth PROPERTY PROTOC_EXTRA_OUTS
  .grpc.pb.cc
  .grpc.pb.h
)

target_link_libraries(client-yc_private-oauth PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-googleapis-common-protos
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  contrib-libs-grpc
  client-yc_private-iam
  contrib-libs-protobuf
)

target_proto_messages(client-yc_private-oauth PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/session_service.proto
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/cloud_user.proto
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/claims.proto
)

target_sources(client-yc_private-oauth PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/session_service.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/session_service.grpc.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/cloud_user.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/cloud_user.grpc.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/claims.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/api/client/yc_private/oauth/claims.grpc.pb.h
)


target_proto_outs(client-yc_private-oauth
  --cpp_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/
)

target_proto_addincls(client-yc_private-oauth
  ./
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/googleapis-common-protos
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)

target_proto_plugin(client-yc_private-oauth
  grpc_cpp
  ${TOOL_grpc_cpp_bin}
)


if(NOT CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING)
  add_dependencies(client-yc_private-oauth
    grpc_cpp
  )
endif()
